article_title: Part-Time Workers: New Nuisance for Employers?

article_metadata.author: The Employment Beat

og.description: This post was written by Sara A. Begley, Amanda D. Haverstick, and Joel S. Barras. A movement to give part-time employees more predictable schedules and related perks recently made front-page news.  See Steven Greenhouse, “A Push to Give Steadier Shifts to Part-Timers,” The New York Times (July 15, 2014).  The number of [...]
